com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.util

类 ByteBufferBackedInputStream

      • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.util.ByteBufferBackedInputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class ByteBufferBackedInputStream
extends InputStream
    Simple InputStream implementation that exposes currently available content of a ByteBuffer.
